item.title: By: Hang

item.description: BTW, installing Eclipse for Android now, and at the same time, downloading some stuffs for Xcode for iOS.
item.content:encoded: BTW, installing Eclipse for Android now, and at the same time, downloading some stuffs for Xcode for iOS.

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: It's proved pidgin needs X11, so I went back to Adium, so far so good, although smileys is not that good, but I'm too lazy to dig out the solution even it's said it is customizable.
item.content:encoded: It’s proved pidgin needs X11, so I went back to Adium, so far so good, although smileys is not that good, but I’m too lazy to dig out the solution even it’s said it is customizable.
